snippet: Mr. Seinfeld will perform an additional show on Dec. 19 at the NYCB Theater in Westbury, N.Y., and donate his income from that event (as well as previously scheduled shows in Brooklyn and Staten Island) to relief organizations.
abstract: Mr. Seinfeld will perform an additional show on Dec. 19 at the NYCB Theater in Westbury, N.Y., and donate his income from that event (as well as previously scheduled shows in Brooklyn and Staten Island) to relief organizations.

headline.main: Seinfeld Adds Show to Benefit Hurricane  Relief
headline.print_headline: Seinfeld Adds Show For Storm Relief
